TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GetValueOverride extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Allows a custom override of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> logic associated with a dependency property that is defined on a dependency object.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the value of the designated .

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
The implemetation of this delegate can be set on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.GetValueOverride%2A> property of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> while calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>.
